profile.name: Amr Mahmoud
profile.tagline: What I can't make, I don't understand.

about.university: E-JUST (Egypt-Japan University of Science and Technology)
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
about.bio: Computer Science student passionate about building full-stack web applications and Android apps. I believe in learning by doing and always strive to understand the fundamentals of what I create.

experiences.title: IT Intern
experiences.description: Building internal university systems with Laravel and PHP. Working on backend development and database management.

experiences.title: DEPI Trainee
experiences.description: Intensive Android development training program. Building native Android applications using Kotlin and Java.

projects.name: Project U
projects.longDescription: A Python/Flask web application that helps students find suitable universities based on their preferences and qualifications. Uses machine learning algorithms to match students with universities.

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.longDescription: An Electron/Python desktop application for monitoring system resources and managing tasks. Provides real-time CPU, memory, and process information.

projects.name: Course Catalog
projects.longDescription: A PHP/Laravel web application for searching and filtering university courses. Features advanced search capabilities and course recommendations.

projects.name: Diff Eq Solver
projects.longDescription: A MATLAB application for solving various types of differential equations with visualization. Supports multiple solving methods and provides graphical outputs.
